channel.title: Zibez - The massive online Adventure
channel.description:
[b]Base[/b] Cleaned Delta Converted to silabsoft client and moparscape.
[i]Welcome to Zibez my goal is to achieve a fun pking server based in edgeville like classic runescape but much easier and funner. You can type ::pickup but you must train your levels. Pickup will be removed soon once we are out of BETA stage. We are currently on [b]Moparscape server status page[/b] and dont forget to vote if you play.
[b][i]Features[/i][/b]
-NPC RANGE (includes) - arrow draw back - correct projectile heights and timings - correct max hit formula - all range items work - prefect hit delays depending on the distance - arrow deleting - basically looks just like how rs use to be - no process timing - level requirements - good bonus makes you hit higher [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/334qakk.jpg[/img]
- NPC MAGE (includes) - correct projectile heights and timing - correct max hits - level requirements - rune deleting - small compact size around 5kb - 90% correct animations - splashing - NO process timing [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/1yn290.jpg[/img]
-NPC MELEE (includes) - prefectly timed, NO process - fairly accurate max hit formula - Dharok effects, hits higher when hp is low (based from str bonus and str level, not just adding a random number....) - all specials work - replace the special handler with the smaller one which is like 2kb? - perfect dieing, uses emote, does not die instantly has a slight wait. [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/mjmgpc.jpg[/img] -PVP MAGE (includes) - player bonus determines if they will splash or hit - if you splash the damage does not show - ancient makes use there effects (ice barrage switchs gfx once frozen, blood barrage steals hp, smoke barrage poisons) - proper timing for ancients, ice burst hits nearly instantly, ice barrage hits a bit more delayed and ice blitz takes the longest to hit, works prefect for rushing - if the player is frozen it doesnt stack up the timer each time you try and refreeze, you must wait till there not frozen to be able to refreeze them. - all level requirements - rune deleting - no massing
-PVP RANGED (includes) - same as npcs - also player bonus's determine if you hit or miss [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/znak1y.jpg[/img]
-PVP MELEE (includes) - same as npcs - also player bonus's determine if you hit or miss [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/ddhy7m.jpg[/img]
-PRAYER ADDED (includes) - all protection types work, str prayer also adds more damage. - protection types makes the damage be cut in half from what it would of been. - no massing with draining, stays at a steady rate. - nothing else added, still working on it
-POTIONS (includes) - all potions works - need to make potions lower the stat back down to the original stat.
-LAG ISSUES (includes) - this server used very low resources, stays at about 0.5 - 1.8 cpu usage. - alot of things have been taken out from the process and used in a different way for timing. - stable, has not crashed on my yet, but i have noticed a logout bug but have no idea what causes it, note this only lasts 15 secs then logs them out. - client is only 300kb
- PVP, this server has a very nice pvp to it, this makes delta look like rsc, seriously.
-PVP following - follows player, if frozen you cannot follow anyone - follows with ranging and also magic and melee - if following a player then gets frozen, you cannot move.
SKILLS added basic fishing South of Edgeville [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/33vgpso.jpg[/img][img]http://i47.tinypic.com/302chgg.jpg[/img]
Burn your logs and gain firemaking experience (perfect) [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/10r5qwm.jpg[/img]
Mining Nearly Complete also with mining guild The Mining Guild Levels 60-69 Once you hit level 60 mining, you have access to the Mining Guild. This special guild is home to bountiful coal rocks, along with the occasional Mithril rock. The availability of this guild changes your moneymaking abilities greatly, seeing as it has loads of rocks and is close to a bank. The Mining Guild is found south of the east Falador bank, with four ladders leading down into it. It not only has many ores, but also filters out the many level 30-59 coal miners that would otherwise hog your rocks. [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/14agzfa.jpg[/img]
Be a Leet Skiller and wear some items you will love to wear such as elegant and a nice warm powderd wig. [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/51br7r.jpg[/img]
START TOWN starts in Edgeville City all teleports require all the correct runes and levels[/i]

item.title: Zibez - The massive online Adventure
item.dc:creator: @shardyboy shardyboy
item.description:
@shardyboy wrote:

Base
Cleaned Delta Converted to silabsoft client and moparscape.

[i]Welcome to Zibez my goal is to achieve a fun pking server based in edgeville like classic runescape but much easier and funner.
You can type ::pickup but you must train your levels. Pickup will be removed soon once we are out of BETA stage.
We are currently on Moparscape server status page and dont forget to vote if you play.

Features

-NPC RANGE (includes)

  • arrow draw back

  • correct projectile heights and timings

  • correct max hit formula

  • all range items work

  • prefect hit delays depending on the distance

  • arrow deleting

  • basically looks just like how rs use to be

  • no process timing

  • level requirements

  • good bonus makes you hit higher

    334qakk.jpg764×494

  • NPC MAGE (includes)

    • correct projectile heights and timing
    • correct max hits
    • level requirements
    • rune deleting
    • small compact size around 5kb
    • 90% correct animations
    • splashing
    • NO process timing
      1yn290.jpg768×525

-NPC MELEE (includes)

  • prefectly timed, NO process
  • fairly accurate max hit formula
  • Dharok effects, hits higher when hp is low (based from str bonus and str level, not just adding a random number…)
  • all specials work
  • replace the special handler with the smaller one which is like 2kb?
  • perfect dieing, uses emote, does not die instantly has a slight wait.
    mjmgpc.jpg763×522

    -PVP MAGE (includes)
  • player bonus determines if they will splash or hit
  • if you splash the damage does not show
  • ancient makes use there effects (ice barrage switchs gfx once frozen, blood barrage steals hp, smoke barrage poisons)
  • proper timing for ancients, ice burst hits nearly instantly, ice barrage hits a bit more delayed and ice blitz takes the longest to hit, works prefect for rushing
  • if the player is frozen it doesnt stack up the timer each time you try and refreeze, you must wait till there not frozen to be able to refreeze them.
  • all level requirements
  • rune deleting
  • no massing

-PVP RANGED (includes)

  • same as npcs
  • also player bonus’s determine if you hit or miss
    znak1y.jpg762×522

-PVP MELEE (includes)

  • same as npcs
  • also player bonus’s determine if you hit or miss
    ddhy7m.jpg769×521

-PRAYER ADDED (includes)

  • all protection types work, str prayer also adds more damage.
  • protection types makes the damage be cut in half from what it would of been.
  • no massing with draining, stays at a steady rate.
  • nothing else added, still working on it

-POTIONS (includes)

  • all potions works
  • need to make potions lower the stat back down to the original stat.

-LAG ISSUES (includes)

  • this server used very low resources, stays at about 0.5 - 1.8 cpu usage.

  • alot of things have been taken out from the process and used in a different way for timing.

  • stable, has not crashed on my yet, but i have noticed a logout bug but have no idea what causes it, note this only lasts 15 secs then logs them out.

  • client is only 300kb

  • PVP, this server has a very nice pvp to it, this makes delta look like rsc, seriously.

-PVP following

  • follows player, if frozen you cannot follow anyone
  • follows with ranging and also magic and melee
  • if following a player then gets frozen, you cannot move.

SKILLS
added basic fishing South of Edgeville

Burn your logs and gain firemaking experience (perfect)

10r5qwm.jpg764×498

Mining Nearly Complete also with mining guild
The Mining Guild
Levels 60-69
Once you hit level 60 mining, you have access to the Mining Guild. This special guild is home to bountiful coal rocks, along with the occasional Mithril rock. The availability of this guild changes your moneymaking abilities greatly, seeing as it has loads of rocks and is close to a bank. The Mining Guild is found south of the east Falador bank, with four ladders leading down into it. It not only has many ores, but also filters out the many level 30-59 coal miners that would otherwise hog your rocks.

Be a Leet Skiller and wear some items you will love to wear such as elegant and a nice warm powderd wig.

51br7r.jpg766×525

START TOWN
starts in Edgeville City
all teleports require all the correct runes and levels[/i]

Read full topic
